Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The gulas in the Golden Labyrinth are a threat even beyond their walls.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:472#4#gula deathbringers}, {@LinkCreature:472#207#brutal gulas}, {@LinkCreature:472#24#gula reavers}, and {@LinkCreature:472#11#gula savages}.

Report to the nearest coordinator when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
